Using love cube application, provided that you are 18 years old. This fun app will help you to diversify sex life. Have a desire to try more positions for love - this kamasutra app for you. Random positions, which drop out after the rotation kamasutra cube, introduces interesting gaming effect and allow to experiment in sexual life. For the dropping out position is necessary to continuously rotate the cube with your finger for 2 seconds, and follow the information messages at the top of the cube. Rate us please to motivate developers to create even more original applications for you. In Premium Cube also adds the ability to: select the list of positions for a random dropping out, secret choose positions for the sequential dropping out (and the ability to hide this option), which will saved even after you close the application Sex Cube, privat options - set a password on the Kamasutra Cube app, settings menu and secret buttom, change the app icon and its name to hide the Love Cube app on your device and something else.) Successful experiments in Love, friends!

To activate all functions of the application Sex Cube need to upgrade to Premium status. You will be able to control dropping out the necessary positions, full access to the settings Sex Cube (ability to set password on app, change icon and app name, the opportunity to change rules of the cube etc).
